block.p: A front-page article and picture caption on Friday about President Bush's new proposal for setting a goal to reduce greenhouse gas emissions misstated the location of his speech announcing the plan. Mr. Bush spoke in an auditorium in the Ronald Reagan Building and International Trade Center in Washington, which also houses the offices of the United States Agency for International Development. He did not speak at the agency.
